document.heading: Technical Amendments to the District of Columbia Financial Institutions Tax Act of 1980 and alley closing in square 569 Amendment Act of 1982

history.narrative: Law 4-130, the “Technical Amendments to the District of Columbia Financial Institutions Tax Act of 1980 and alley closing in square 569 Amendment Act of 1982,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-328, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 27, 1982 and May 11, 1982, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 1, 1982, it was assigned Act No. 4-195 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
